message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13000. It's a fair compromise considering its value to you, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this product at a discounted price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm willing to make one more compromise, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12200. It's getting close to the original price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
